app_name: Groups Control Groups Photo and Video Editing Apps Quick Slideshow Maker Music
app_description: It s so quick and easy to use! Do not waste your time making a slideshow when you can do it in just a few seconds. Step 1. Add Photos Step 2. Add Music Step 3. Export Video To Gallery It s that simple! Now you can share your slideshow with your friends and family on Facebook Instagram Youtube and more. Perfect for your special days like birthdays weddings anniversaries graduations etc. Features: Add as many photos as you want Apply your favourite photo effects Add specialized texts and drawings Add multiple songs from our own library or yours Animated transitions between photos Auto sync music with your slideshow Customizable photo and transition durations Premium Membership And Terms We offer a one time forever upgrade for 12.99 and a monthly subscription for 3.99 month to the premium membership which will give you access to additional features on an ongoing basis including: Unlimited Photos Unlock Stock Music Unlock All Transitions Unlock All Text Options Unlock All Filters Unlock Sketch Remove Watermark Remove Final Slide Remove Ads Payment for Premium Membership will be will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase. Your monthly subscription will automatically renew and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. You can turn off auto renew at any time from your iTunes account settings but refunds will not be provided for any unused portion of the term. If you purchase your subscription during the free trial period any unused portion of the free trial period will be forfeited.
